# 1987 Bangladesh President's Gold Cup

| count          = 1
| second_other   =  Guangdong
| third_other    =
| matches        = 16
| goals          = 53
| attendance     =
| prevseason     = 1986
| nextseason     = 1989
| player         =  Walid Abu Al-Sel   Monir Hossain Manu
| goalkeeper     =  Bhaskar Ganguly
| top_scorer     =  Wu Qunli   Nizar Mahrous  (5 goals)
}}
The '''1987 Bangladesh President's Gold Cup''' was the fifth edition of the Bangladesh President's Gold Cup. The event was held at the Dhaka Stadium in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
